thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Sheryn

author: Sheryn
title: Sheryn
text: Had an amazing experience with Intrepid Travel on the Europe Explorer Basix trip. Very well organised and couldn't fault the tour leaders. They are absolutely not paid enough. To have to rely on travellers tips, who have already paid out thousands to go on these trips, is extremely poor in my opinion. They are never 'off duty' and are extremely good at their jobs, make them feel like it!
